amendment.description: Amendment directs the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to conduct a feasibility study on the development of an online public resource that would list the location and height of potential low-altitude aviation obstructions, such as guy-wire and free-standing towers and also gives the Administrator one year to conduct the study and report to Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-46 to direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to conduct a feasibility study on the development of an online public resource that would list the location and height of potential low-altitude aviation obstructions, such as guy-wire and free-standing towers. Would also give the Administrator one year to conduct the study and report to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
